welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Putnam Valley! This charming city is known for its picturesque nature, quaint landmarks, and warm community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Putnam Valley has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stewart Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Stewart Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dutchess County Airport houses all check-in counters, security checkpoints, and boarding gates.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dutchess County Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Danbury Municipal Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Danbury Municipal Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orange County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Orange County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free. No password is required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport caters to executive and luxury travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
